name: Code Mode MCP Server
description: MCP server for LLM-assisted reverse engineering via code execution

installinstructions.Darwin: 1. Install via Plugin Manager, or copy to ~/Library/Application Support/Binary Ninja/plugins/
installinstructions.Linux: 1. Install via Plugin Manager, or copy to ~/.binaryninja/plugins/
installinstructions.Windows: 1. Install via Plugin Manager, or copy to %APPDATA%\Binary Ninja\plugins\

author: Austyn Krutsinger
